mapper.update: update t_food_material set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATCODE = #{matcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATNAME = #{matname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISNODE = #{isnode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATTYPE = #{mattype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNITID = #{unitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, MATCODE, MATNAME, PARENTID, ISNODE, MATTYPE, UNITID from t_food_material where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, MATCODE, MATNAME, PARENTID, ISNODE, MATTYPE, UNITID from t_food_material
